channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Minneapolis killings put a focus on use of body cameras

item.title: Reporter's Notebook: Living and reporting from Minneapolis in crisis
item.description: In Minneapolis, disruption has become part of daily life for nearly everyone, including for NPR reporter Meg Anderson. Many residents are living in fe...

item.title: In China, AI is no longer optional for some kids. It's part of the curriculum
item.description: While debate rages in the U.S. about the merits and risks of AI in schools, it's become a state-mandated part of the curriculum in China, as the autho...

item.title: Meta, TikTok and YouTube are on trial over whether their apps hurt children
item.description: A trial kicking off in a Los Angeles courtroom marks the first time a jury will hear claims that social media companies knowingly hook young users and...

item.title: Trump to hold de facto midterm kickoff in Iowa focused on the economy, energy prices
item.description: President Trump's rally in Iowa on Tuesday brings his message to a state disproportionately affected by his economic policies and whose voters could h...

item.title: Deadly US winter storm leaves flights delayed and thousands without power
item.description: At least a dozen people have died in multiple US states possibly due to the storm, officials have said.

item.title: 1/26: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Grief and outrage in Minneapolis after Alex Pretti killing; Border Patrol's Gregory Bovino set to leave Minneapolis.

item.title: Key legislators seek DOJ records on Alex Pretti and Renee Good killings by next week
item.description: Congress is ratcheting up its scrutiny of the killing of Alex Pretti by a federal agent in Minneapolis on Saturday, with some House Democrats pressing...

item.title: Australia sizzles in blistering heat wave with temperatures as high as 120

item.title: Trump raises US tariffs on South Korea imports to 25%
item.description: Trump has accused Seoul of "not living up" to a trade deal that was reached last year.

item.title: Newsom probing TikTok over alleged suppression of anti-Trump content
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom says he's launching a probe into allegations that TikTok censored content critical of President Trump.

item.title: Immigration chief at centre of Trump's crackdown set to leave Minneapolis
item.description: The US president is sending border tsar Tom Homan to the city in an apparent shift in tone from the White House.

item.title: Nipah virus outbreak in India triggers Asia airport screenings
item.description: Airports in Thailand and Nepal have begun screening passengers from West Bengal.

item.title: India and EU announce landmark trade deal
item.description: The long-awaited deal comes as both Delhi and Brussels contend with economic and geopolitical pressure from the US.

item.title: Lawyer apologizes for AI-generated fabrications in murder case
item.description: The fake submissions included fabricated quotes and nonexistent case citations purportedly from the Supreme Court in Austalia's Victoria state.

item.title: In their words: An examination of statements Trump officials made about what led to Pretti’s death
What to know about Tom Homan, Trump’s border czar, as he heads to Minneapolis
Bovino is set to leave Minneapolis as Trump reshuffles the leadership of his immigration crackdown
item.description: A federal judge is considering Minnesota’s challenge to the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown.
